name: Spring Leap
description:
An (almost) infinite jumper where you help a bunny gathered colored eggs in preparation for spring. How many eggs can you collect? Will it be enough to fill your basket?

Controls: Browser

  • A(Leftt arrow), D(Right arrow) to move; W(Up arrow) to jump
  • P to pause game
  • Mouse to navigate menus

Controls: Mobile

  • Tap screen to navigate menus
  • Tap to jump
  • Tap/hold Left/Right buttons to move
